name: Mario Hoops 3-on-3
description:
It's a whole new ball game when the superstars from the Mushroom Kingdom
and some special guests throw down on the court. Use the touch screen on
the Wii U™ GamePad to execute tricky dribbles, special passes, and sweet
shots. Collect coins for extra points, and the highest score wins at the
sound of the buzzer!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
